Verses: 2 manupuththirane, Nee Ammon Puththirarukku Edhiraaga Mugaththaiththiruppi, Avargalukku Virodhamaagath Theerkkadharisanam Uraiththu,

3 ammon Puththirarukku Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Karththaraagiya Aandavarudaiya Vaarththaiyaik Kelungal; Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiraar: En Parisuththa Sthalam Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkappadugirapodhum, Yoodhaa Vamsaththaar Siraiyiruppile Pogirapodhum, Nee Avargalukku Virodhamaaga Aa Aa, Endru Nindhiththapadiyinaal,

4 idho, Naan Unnaik Kizhakku Dhesaththaarukku Sudhandharamaaga Oppukkoduppen, Avargal Unnil Thangal Arangalaik Katti Unnil Thangal Vaasasthalangalai Undupannuvaargal; Avargal Un Kanigalaip Pusiththu, Un Paalaik Kudippaargal.
5 naan Rappaavai Ottagangalin Kottagaiyaiyum, Ammon Puththirarin Dhesaththai Aattukkidaiyumaakkuven; Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolveergal.
6 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Dhesaththukku Virodhamaaga Nee Kaikotti, Un Kaalaal Thatti Varmamvaiththu, Aagadiyam Panninapadiyinaal,

7 idho, Unakku Virodhamaaga, Naan En Kaiyai Neetti, Unnai Jaadhigalukkuk Kollaiyaaga Oppukkoduththu, Unnai Janangalukkulle Veratruppogappanni, Unnai Dhesangalukkulle Azhiththu, Unnai Nirmoolamaakkuven, Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaai.
8 karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal: Idho Yoodhaa Vamsaththaar Ellaa Jaadhigalukkum Oththavargalendru Movaabum Seyeerum Sollugirapadiyinaal,
9 idho, Ammon Puththirarinper Jaadhigalukkul Iraadhapadikku Naan Ammon Puththirarin Dhesaththaik Kizhakku Dhesaththaarukkuth Thirandhuvaiththu, Sudhandharamaai Oppukkodukkiravannamaaga,

10 naan Movaab Dhesaththin Pakkaththilulla Adhin Kadaiyaandhara Oorgalaagiya Pattanangal Mudharkondulla Dhesaththin Alangaaramaagiya Pedhyesimoththaiyum Paagaalmeyonaiyum, Keereeyaaththaayeemaiyum Avargalukkuth Thirandhuvaiththu,
11 movaabile Nyaayangalai Seyven, Appozhudhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal.
12 karththaaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal: Edhom Yoodhaa Vamsaththaaridaththil Kurodhantheerththupazhivaangi, Periya Kutrancheydhapadiyinaal,

13 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar: Naan Edhom Dhesaththukku Virodhamaaga En Kaiyai Neetti Adhil Manusharaiyum Mirugangalaiyum Iraadhapadikku Sangaarampanni, Adhaith Themaan Thuvakkith Thedhaanmattum Vanaandharamaakkuven; Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal.

14 naan Isravelaagiya En Janaththin Kaiyinaal Edhominidaththil Pazhivaanguven; Avargal En Kobaththinpadiyum En Ukkiraththinpadiyum Edhomukku Seyvaargal; Appozhudhu Naan Pazhivaanguvadhu Innadhendru Arindhukolvaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
15 karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal; Pelisthiyar Kurodhakkaararaayirundhu, Pazhampagaiyaal Keduseyyavendumendru, Varmam Vaiththup Pazhivaanginapadiyinaal,
16 idho, Naan Pelisthiyarukku Virodhamaaga En Kaiyai Neetti, Kireththiyarai Sangariththu, Samuththirakkaraiyil Meedhiyaanavargalai Azhiththu,
17 ukkiramaana Thandanaigalinaal Avargalil Kodidhaaip Pazhivaanguven; Naan Avargalil Pazhivaangumpodhu Naan Karththar Endru Arindhukolvaargal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
